techmeme.title: Cloudflare says attackers gained access to a Salesforce instance it uses for internal customer case management, as part of the Salesloft Drift breach (Sergiu Gatlan/BleepingComputer)
OpenAI CPO Kevin Weil will become VP of a new group called OpenAI for Science to build an "AI-powered platform that accelerates scientific discovery" (Maxwell Zeff/TechCrunch)
Apple's lead AI researcher for robotics, Jian Zhang, has left for Meta's Robotics Studio; sources: three more researchers left Apple's Foundation Models team (Mark Gurman/Bloomberg)
Plaud says it has sold 1M+ of its $159 NotePin AI recording devices since 2023, is profitable, and is on track to bring in $250M in annualized revenue this year (Iain Martin/Forbes)
OpenAI acquires product analytics company Statsig for $1.1B and shuffles executive roles, with Statsig CEO Vijaye Raji becoming OpenAI's CTO of Applications (Hayden Field/The Verge)
